A C E G L M R S

A

AbstractServerMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
Abstract base class for the Mojos in the plug-in.
AbstractServerMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
The default constructor is protected because this is an abstract base class.

C

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
This package contains the classes that implement the plug-in's Mojos.

E

execute() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.RunMojo
Execute the Mojo by launching the GreenMail server and waiting for the stop command.
execute() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.StopMojo
Issue a stop command to the monitor in order to shutdown the GreenMail mail servers.

G

getMonitorKey() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
Get the key used to prefix monitor commands.
getMonitorPort() - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
Get the port number on which the monitor is listening.
GreenMailServer - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
Encapsulates the GreenMail mail servers allowing then to be controlled by a monitor.
GreenMailServer() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.GreenMailServer
The constructor initialises GreenMailServer.greenMail with the default configuration.

L

logError(String) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
Write an error message to the plug-in log file.

Write an error message to the plug-in log file.
logError(String) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Logger
Write an error message to the log file.
logError(String, Throwable) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Logger
Write an error message to the log file.
Logger - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
Implemented by objects that write error and information messages to log files.
logInfo(String) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
Write an informational message to the plug-in log file.
logInfo(String) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Logger
Write an information message to the log file.

M

Monitor - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
The monitor object is used to control a server.
Monitor(String, int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Monitor
The constructor that initialises the monitor key and port.

R

RunMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
Run the GreenMail mail servers.
RunMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.RunMojo
The default constructor.
runMonitor(Server, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Monitor
Run the monitor listening for commands and sending them to the server.

S

sendCommand(String, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Monitor
Send a command to the monitor.
Server - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
This interface is implemented by server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
start(Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.GreenMailServer
Start the GreenMail mail servers.
start(Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Server
Start the server.
stop(Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.GreenMailServer
Stop the GreenMail mail servers.
stop(Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.Server
Stop the server.
StopMojo - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo
Stop the GreenMail mail servers.
StopMojo() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.greenmail.mojo.StopMojo
